               ÃŸÃŸ                                            ÃŸÃŸ
           
           Cibele is a game based on a true story about love, sex,
           and the internet.
           You play as a 19 year old girl named Nina who has become
           close with a young man she met in an online game. Her
           relationship with him heats up, becoming more and more
           intimate with each phone call and private chat.
           
           The game unravels in three acts.
           The player plays as Nina, going into her online game,
           exploring her desktop, chatting with her friends and
           going about her daily life as she plays her online game.
           It is a narrative game which strives to help the player
           walk in Nina's shoes as she plays her online game,
           becoming more and more intimate with her lover as each
           act unfolds
